sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Torquato Tassos Aminta Englisht To this is added Ariadne's complaint in imitation of Anguillara; written by the translater of Tasso's Aminta Aminta. English Tasso, Torquato, 1544-1595. Reynolds, Henry, fl. 1627-1632.
[94] p.
Printed by Aug: Mathewes for William Lee, and are to bee sold at the signe of the Turkes Head in Fleetstreet, London : 1628.
A translation, by Henry Reynolds, of: Aminta. In verse. The words "Torquato Tassos Aminta Englisht" on title page are incorporated into a pictorial engraving. Signatures: A-M⁴ (-M4). A3 is a cancel. Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University. Library.
=======

[94] p.
Printed by Aug: Mathewes for William Lee, and are to bee sold at the signe of the Turkes Head in Fleetstreet, London : 1628.
